argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | offvalfv.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 2 |  | offvalfv.f | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 3 |  | offvalfv.g | |- ( ph -> G Fn A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fnfvelrn | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) e. ran F ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) e. ran F ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fnfvelrn | |- ( ( G Fn A /\ x e. A ) -> ( G ` x ) e. ran G ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( G ` x ) e. ran G ) |
| 8 |  | #P_dffn5 | |- ( F Fn A <-> F = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_dffn5 | |- ( G Fn A <-> G = ( x e. A |-> ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> G = ( x e. A |-> ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 5, 7, 9, 11 | #P_offval2 | |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) ) |
